task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find the instructions to perform addition on the Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully perform addition operation, you must know about the concept of addition.
taskbody.result: The addition result is displayed on the screen.
taskbody.example:
You want to add 2 and 5. The equation will look like 2+5=7. You enter 2. Press (+). Enter 5. Press (=)
The result 7 appears on the screen.
